channel.title: Command
channel.description: Ok. I got the Banuser command and any1 can use it i know in client.java i have to change the rights but i can still do it witha noob acc and ban ppl do i have to put it in another folder too? :confused:

item.title: Command
item.dc:creator: @weaving8 weaving8
item.description:
@weaving8 wrote:

heres a code


if(command.startsWith("banuser") && (playerRights >= 1 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Mod Adam")))
                        {
                        String victim = command.substring(8);
			PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
                        System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
                        sendMessage("Player "+victim+" successfully banned");
			appendToBanned(victim);
      BufferedWriter bw = null;

      try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
	bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
	bw.newLine();
	bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
	ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	if (bw != null) try {
	    bw.close();
	} catch (IOException ioe2) {
	    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
	}
      }

      try {
         bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./logs/banlogs.txt", true));
	bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
	bw.newLine();
	bw.flush();
      } catch (IOException ioe) {
	ioe.printStackTrace();
      } finally {
	if (bw != null) try {
	    bw.close();
	} catch (IOException ioe2) {
	    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
	}
      }
}In the command, change the playerRights >= 1 to 2 or 3, or keep at 1. Then change "Mod Adam" to your ingame name.

item.title: Command
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Here you are:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“banuser”) && (playerRights >= 1 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Mod Adam”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

}[/code]
In the command, change the playerRights >= 1 to 2 or 3, or keep at 1. Then change “Mod Adam” to your ingame name.
